ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora tips was Re: Dalnir: any bard toys?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Sylly Songsynger  To:  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 10:31 AM Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora tips was Re:
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 10:31 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora tips was Re: Dalnir: any bard toys?


> Greetings!
>
> We went to Kaesora to explore and try for the coin. Me 51, 'nother Bard
51,
> third bard 50 and wizard 50. I had a map - get one. We zoned in and iirc
> took the left passage - then killed some bugs - then took a right (check
> map) and headed for the library on a whim. There were several bugs to
kill
> along the way and some spec's too. Nothing to break a sweat for our
levels
> although we lamented and tried to pull singles as best we could. We
pulled
> to clear the outside of the library then moved up closer.
>
> On the porch, we agro'd something and as we fought we also agro's the '??
> librarian' and killed 'em both. The something turned out to be the froog
> that dropped the coin for the quest. Something else there dropped a book
> (?? iirc) that had good int +5 or +6 and that made our wiz happy. Then we
> went in the library and looked around. Perhaps killed something else -
> can't remember. We did happen to go up stairs and looked around the
> balcony. On the ground, we found something for one of the medallion
> quests - "piece of a medallion" or something. BTW - we were the only ppl
in
> the zone - sad but true - and it looked to be a very cool zone for ppl who
> can get exp at this level. You'd want a good party, some anti-poison
> songs/spells but it looked to be good.
>
> We went outside and started to look around. Then we got our obligatory
> over-pull. About 6 things agro'd and we were swarmed by greenies. Evac
was
> no problem as we got what we wanted and it was time to go anyhow. Next
> time, we wil be heading to Dalnir's for the Royal Crown. Then Suladan
will
> have all 6 coins. Kaldivar needs Kasora and Dalnir. I have Selos Drums
so
> its not as high a priority for me.
>
> So, I dont know if the froog that drops the coin in Kaesora roams the
whole
> dungeon or he is always found in the library area - but that's where we
> found him.
>
> Sylly
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Richard Read" <richard.read@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:37 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Dalnir: any bard toys?
>
>
> > I am doing this quest at the moment and have 4 of the coins. I just need
> the
> > Dalnir one and the Kaesora one.
>
> > Also any tips for Kaesora? I've never been there but it sounds a bit of
a
> > nightmare. Luckily I am part of a regularish group of level 43 to 52
> players
> > so I'm not too worried about getting killed.
> >
> > Also spoilers on the location of the coin in Kaesora would be most
> welcome.
>
>
>
